name: Asian Tiger Camo - Overdye
description:
The beauty of the Asian Tiger Camo REISSUE now done in a black overdyed edition. This process has embedded the dye into the fabric changing the color scheme to shades of black, blue, green and brown.

(Please note: Each pair is individually dyed, leaving a truly one of one impression on the garment. Each garment will vary in tone)

Primarily used by the Vietnamese / Philippine armies, Asian Tiger camo is very rare and distinct compared to it's American issued counterpart. The main difference is found in the colors; the greens and browns are more vibrant, giving the pattern more visibility.

As part of the magma REISSUE program, these fatigues are made from 100% authentic Asian Tiger surplus, the fatigues are tailored to fit as a tapered leg. Includes adjustable waistbands, button fly and French seams. 4 cargo style pockets are included (2 on the seat and 2 on the thighs).

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.

For international orders or inquiries, email your information to info@magmabyiris.com. We will be glad to provide you a quote for shipping prior to ordering.

name: Koi Pattern - 5 Panel Hat
description:
Using a rare traditional Japanese Koi patterned fabric, the 5 panel is made in Canada using only the best materials. Limited in production, these caps are ideal for Spring/Summer.

An added feature is a fully wicking band used on the inside for additional comfort and function.

Standard sizing for the cap, the hat also includes an adjustable nylon strap with plastic clip and custom brand label on the inside.

One size fits all.

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.

name: Anorak Hoody - All Black
description:
The Anorak Hoody is a great sweater for Fall Winter. Made from 100% pre shrunk Canadian Fleece, the hoody is guaranteed to keep you extremely comfortable.

The hood unit is cut slightly higher to block out any wind, but also so that it is not too snug, allowing for circulation. The lining is an Egyptian linen fabric, adding nice contrast to the outer layer.

The pouch pocket is made from a raw Japanese denim and includes 2 entry points; one via flap, the other via Kangaroo style access in the front. The pouch is sealed with two charred Elm wood buttons for that extra detail.

Fits true to size.

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.

For international orders or inquiries, email your information to info@magmabyiris.com. We will be glad to provide you a quote for shipping prior to ordering.

Fits true to size.

name: Officer Shirt - Denim / Chambray
description:
Made from 100% cotton, the Officer Shirt is a comfortable, stylish button up for the season, shown here in a 6 oz. denim fabric.

The shirt is made using the reverse side of the fabric, and features chambray accenting - used on the inner back yolk, and along the cuffs. The shirt also features a work inspired pocket on the left chest, reinforced with tack stitching for durability.

The final touches come via wooden buttons used to adorn the center button placket and sleeves.

Fits true to size.

Proudly made in Canada

name: magma REISSUE program - Multicam Camo
description:
Being introduced globally within the past 2 years, the Multicam Camo is one of the newest patterns currently being used by some of the world's major military forces. The pattern merges the traditional woodland, desert and DPM patterns to form one blended combination. 

This tactical pant includes:

- Teflon® coated (water resistant)
- 8 pockets (including 2 utility pockets found on the lower leg)
- reinforced knee and seat areas for added durability
- unique cinch cord/button flap cargo style pockets
- button fly
- drawstring waist
- 100% cotton 

As part of the magma REISSUE program, these trousers are tailored to fit with a relaxed taper throughout the leg.

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.

name: City Crewneck - Navy / Speckle
description:
The City Crewneck is a classic staple for the season. Comfort equals style on this piece as it's made from 100% pre-shrunk Canadian Fleece. 

The fit on the fleece is slightly relaxed, allowing for comfort and mobility. Layering is also another option with this sweater, at times when the climate cools down in temperature.

Details include twill taped seams, unique paneling (note the tricep area), raw Japanese denim welt pocket with cotton lining. The pocket is also tacked down, making it more secured using tonal stitching. Ideal for a smartphone, sunglasses or cigarettes.

Fits true to size.

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.

name: magma REISSUE program - BDU Trousers / Navy Blue
description:
The BDU Trouser is a basic cargo pant used by Military Police. Made from a 100% cotton twill, the pants are extremely comfortable for the season.

Based off a 6 pocket design, which include slack style hand pockets, the pants also come with a button fly system, adjustable waist and reinforced knee and seat regions for durability.

As part of the magma REISSUE program, these trousers are tailored to fit with a relaxed taper throughout the leg.

name: magma REISSUE program - BDU Trousers / Olive
description:
The BDU Trouser is a basic cargo pant used by most military's around the world. Made from a 100% cotton ripstop fabric, the pants are breathable and are excellent for warmer climate.

Based off a 6 pocket design, which include slack style hand pockets, the pants also come with a button fly system, adjustable waist and reinforced knee and seat regions for durability.

As part of the magma REISSUE program, these trousers are tailored to fit with a relaxed taper throughout the leg.

name: magma REISSUE program - US Tactical Tiger Camo
description:
The US Tactical Tiger Camo cargo is used by the elite forces of the United States. This pattern is extremely rare and hard to come by.

The pant is designed with 7 pockets (with a utility pocket on the lower left leg) and is made from 100% cotton-ripstop fabric. There is a polyurethane strip running along the inner waist, aimed at securing shirts that are tucked in by Military personnel. The rise on the pant is slightly higher, aimed at being worn at the waist.

The waist is adjustable on either side. These are also a zipper fly pant, as most camo fatigues are button fly. The pants also include reinforced knees and seat regions for durability.

As part of the magma REISSUE program, these trousers are tailored to fit with a relaxed taper throughout the leg.

Sizes 28 - 31 are readily available. Guaranteed to sell out fast!

- SHIPPING -

North American shipping is set at check out.
